type.name: org.gradle.tooling.events.FailureResult
type.description:
Describes how an operation finished with failures.
@since 2.4

method.name: getFailures
method.description:
Returns the failures that occurred while running the operation, if any.

returns:the failures, empty if the operation failed without any specific failure information.

property.name: failures
property.description:
Returns the failures that occurred while running the operation, if any.

returns:the failures, empty if the operation failed without any specific failure information.
